plot: A wealthy society girl must live on $150 a month to prove to her father that she can stand being married to a poor man.
title: The Luckiest Girl in the World
plot_es: A wealthy society girl must live on $150 a month to prove to her father that she can stand being married to a poor man.
original_name: The Luckiest Girl in the World
plot_en: A wealthy society girl must live on $150 a month to prove to her father that she can stand being married to a poor man.
